name: Beat Bounce (drgvdg)
description:
Game made in a week for the Rhythm Jam (https://itch.io/jam/rhythm-jam-2021)

Programming and Art -- Diego Gonzalez

Music - Justin Smilan

All Art and Music was made during this Jam, though there were some inspirations which are listed at the bottom.

Game Instructions:

Warning: Playing in browser has spotty performance, especially with music sync. Highly recommend downloading, though linux and mac versions are untested.

Either play with Mouse or Controller, though menus only work with the mouse currently.

ESC - Pause (Does not work when in full screen on the web version)

M - Mute

Left Joystick - Control Jump

Mouse - Control Jump

Space/Left Click/Controller A - Continue in conversations

CHEATCODE:

In the level select screen, press U and I to change the amount of levels unlocked. Some levels can be frustrating so no worries if you want to skip part of it :)

Credits:

Kid sprite based off of  Jason-Em classic hero Style (https://opengameart.org/content/classic-hero)
